name: Perl: Avoid Programs with a low comment/code ratio
description: Programs should be documented. This reports shows all the Programs with less than a defined comment / code ratio. This ratio is a parameter of the rule and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all Programs that have a low comment / code ratio. It provides the following information: Program full name, comment / code ratio
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are sufficient comments within the Artifact.
